attributes.action: Reduce the cost of petrol and deisel prices.
attributes.additional_details: It is affecting many families, jobs and the standard of living. Living expenses are increasing and many people cannot afford it.
attributes.background: Reduce taxes and prices of essentials

rejection.details:
The Government is not directly responsible for the price of motor fuel, which is set by retailers, but we have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Suspend VAT on road fuels to reduce fuel costs: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/610567

Remove duty on motor fuel completely: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/613908

Temporarily suspend all taxes on all fuels and energy bills: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/610585
